member.name: EMRSETPALETTEENTRIES
member.summary: The EMRSETPALETTEENTRIES structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRSETPALETTEENTRIES.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSETPALETTEENTRIES.iStart
member.summary: Index of first entry to set.

member.name: EMRSETPALETTEENTRIES.aPalEntries
member.summary: Array of PALETTEENTRY structures. Note that peFlags members in the structures do not contain any flags.
